main event: A witness saw a luminous object hovering and then moving at high speed in Wells, Maine in 1962.
interesting points: The object was described as a luminous cloud or fog about 30 to 40 feet in diameter., The witness reported the object moving silently and rapidly., The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes., The object was not a typical meteor, as it exhibited unusual behavior and characteristics., The sighting was reported to the Air Force for investigation due to its credible nature.
witness description: The witness was terrified and was reported to be shocked and bewildered upon returning home.
